content: I'm representing Pokerlook (Official Myria.com partner), a worldwide crypto poker that recently launched it's ICO, Game and NFT sales.Pokerlook assets run on Ethereum Smart Contracts and it's cooperating with Myria to utilize Ethereum Layer 2 to offer 0 fee transactions across the whole system.In game playable currency is USDT (ERC-20) which can be deposited via MetaMask. We are also integrating credit card deposit options for easier access to the gameplay.After ICO is complete $PKL token will be used in game as main currency next to USDT and for deposits/withdrawal options.Pokerlook NFTs (Pokerlook Avatars and Membership Cards) will have in-game utility in terms of benefits like higher rakeback, more deposit bonuses, faster leveling, cheaper cosmetics addons and more.For more information about all aspects of Pokerlook project you can check, https://pokerlook.ioHere are some helpfull links about the project:Whitepaper: https://pokerlook.io/whitepaper.pdfOfficial website (+ NFT Avatars Mint): https://pokerlook.io$PKL token ICO: https://token.pokerlook.ioGame: https://play.pokerlook.ioPreview:https://i.imgur.com/gve0JZW.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/XyXOz1O.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/MNM6Sln.jpeg

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Neat graphics but why in earth are you doing ICO in your own site? I mean there are reasons why people stop doing those. One of the main ones is that who would want to connect their wallet to some unknown site that's most likely aimed to drain wallets?I like the concept and the art but not in a million years i will connect my metamask to buy from your web page. You have to earn your trust before people do that.

comments.author: pokerlook
comments.body: The only functionality our wallet has is to suggest transaction  to approve. It is impossible to drain any wallets. The safety of our users funds and in general is our main priority.
